title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin discusses the up and down season Patrick Mahomes has had this year and why we need to put his "regression" in context with other all-time great QBs. He believes it's time for the Seahawks to move on from head coach Pete Carroll and who the best replacements would be. He explains why Brian Kelly has the resume to succeed at LSU even if it looks like it has gotten off to a rough start. Plus, Greg Cosell from NFL Films joins the show to breakdown how the Patriots beat the Bills while only throwing the ball 3 times. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
